wikipedia_page.main: Malcolm Alan Bennett (21 September 1958 – 1 March 2015) was a British poet and author. He was the co-creator of the noir-inspired pulp magazine BRUTE! with Aidan Hughes.

response: In 1989 she made an extended appearance on British television discussion programme After Dark, alongside Mary Stott, Malcolm Bennett and Hans Eysenck among others.

On 28 October 1989, during a discussion on differences between men and women with among others Mary Stott and Hans Eysenck, one guest, Malcolm Bennett, "successfully propositioned the Happy Hooker author Xaviera Hollander, and the pair walked off the live set to continue their discourse privately."Vincent Raison, Obituary of Malcolm Bennett, The Guardian 8 April 2015, accessed 15 October 2015
*Malcolm Bennett, 56, British poet and author.Malcolm Bennett obituary
